title: American horror story murder house - Hayden confronts Mrs Montgomery
author: ONCEUPON a HORRORSTORY
comment: Hayden was the most annoying spirit in the house. While I understood where her rage was coming from, her decision making made no sense after death. Killing Dr. Harmon, and for what? Now you have his whole family stuck there with you for eternity. 🙄 Talk about adding more wood to the fire.
its so sad how Lily Rabe dies early in every season goddamnit ryan
I have the stress level of Nora tbh

I loved Kate Mara as Hayden she played an amazing manipulative crazy bitch so well I wish she was in other seasons 

"Yeah I'm dead,

All of Lily Rabe’s characters are so depressing XD

Mrs. Montgomery is stricken with sadness over the loss of her child and doomed to a life stuck in the house where it all happened.
description: American horror story murder house - Hayden confronts Mrs Montgomery
